{"step_by_step_thinking": "Carotid endarterectomy is a surgical procedure used to remove plaque buildup in the carotid arteries, which are the major blood vessels in the neck that supply blood to the brain. Population need: This refers to the prevalence of carotid artery disease within a specific population.
